channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overflowing paper and card recycling bins, 30th December
item.description:
All three recycling bins are full so more paper and card is being left next to the bins on the ground.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous pavement, 30th December
item.description:
The combination of the overhanging bushes, and treacherous uneven pavement makes walking this section of pavement dangerous. The safest thing to do is cross the road, or walk in the road. I appreciate the overgrown bushes are not down to the council, but the pavement is, but maybe a two pronged approach is the way forward (ask the landowner to maintain their plants, and council repair the pavement).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 80, Longlands Park Crescent, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on underpass walls, 30th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lady Dock Path, Rotherhithe, Greater London

item.title: Blocked drains, 30th December
item.description:
Many of the drains in Fletching Rd are blocked. They need clearing to prevent excessive runoff when it rains down Lansdowne Lane and beyond.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): The Village, Charlton

item.title: Fly tipping & blocked drains, 30th December
item.description:

item.title: Trade fireworks signage Avenue Road Broadway, 30th December
item.description:
I reported yesterday as I saw 1 signage trade fireworks advertising their sale but today there are 3 other signs advertising trade fireworks! I outside the bakery in Pickford lane another opposite Pickford road sitting on pavement outside house under Pentecostal sign and one near convenient Asda at the junction of avenue road broadway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken mirror, shattered on the public footpath, 30th December
item.description:
The shattered mirror has been abandoned on the public pathway for one day, 31A Glebe Road, BR1 3NT. The shattered mirror is directly outside the property on the public side of the wall. The shattered mirror is a dangerous hazard to people and animals and especially in the evening when there will be no visibility.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62b, College Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 30th December
item.description:
I saw the council litter picker kick one of these bags from the pavement into the alley and then signal to the passing truck to come and pick up the bags. This has not happened - they are now in the alleyway- please return and remove the bags. You said you couldnâ€™t locate them - here are the three words location ///after.hours.force as requested

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Station Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
